author: jlaherran
body:
## Steps to reproduce

Run New-AzureRmRoleAssignment providing the signInName, Owner as built in RoleDefinitionName and the subscription id '/subscriptions/xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx' in the scope.
## Expected behavior

Role assignment successful
## Actual behavior

```
New-AzureRmRoleAssignment : Cannot access a closed Stream.
At /root/Azure-Roles-Demo.ps1:20 char:1
+ New-AzureRmRoleAssignment -SignInName $signInName -RoleDefinitionName ...
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : CloseError: (:) [New-AzureRmRoleAssignment], ObjectDisposedException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : Microsoft.Azure.Commands.Resources.NewAzureRoleAssignmentCommand

```
## Environment data

CentOS Linux release 7.2.1511 (Core)

| Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| PSVersion | 6.0.0-alpha |
| PSEdition | Core |
| PSCompatibleVersions | {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...} |
| BuildVersion | 3.0.0.0 |
| GitCommitId | v6.0.0-alpha.10 |
| CLRVersion |  |
| WSManStackVersion | 3.0 |
| PSRemotingProtocolVersion | 2.3 |
| SerializationVersion | 1.1.0.1 |
